short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays real-time exchange rates and rate trends for AUD, USD, and CNY

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay updated with real-time AUD to CNY currency exchange rates with our intuitive tool. Monitor live rate changes, view historical rate charts, and set custom notifications to alert you when the exchange rate hits your desired high or low threshold. Perfect for travelers, investors, and anyone needing timely currency updates."

Feel free to modify it based on your specific features!
